TopicTitle: space station falling in atmosphere stock only docked

Articles.Content:
http://i.imgur.com/FO1Z3kC.jpg

10 kerbals on the space station

5 modules 1 escape pod

You're breaking one of my rules: for every Kerbal on board a space station there needs to e a seat on a docked spacecraft with return capability. Most of the time (unless it's a replacement crew) it's the vessel they came with.
3 kerbals cqame with return craft and got into space station so escape pod is empty other 7 came with the modules

3 kerbals cqame with return craft and got into space station so escape pod is empty other 7 came with the modules

But still they should be able to return safely if for instance the space station falls back to the planet
I like the first picture: Jeb grinning like a loony, and the other two screaming their heads off.
